t: HERBLOOM
s: A compound word of Herb and Bloom that means "to present healthy beauty and vitality to everyday life, just like a flower in full bloom with healthy plant-derived ingredients grown in good soil". Herbloom is a vegan skincare brand based on plant-derived ingredients for balanced and healthy skin.
